net.sourceforge.seqware.common.util.runtools
Class TestConsoleAdapter

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.seqware.common.util.runtools.ConsoleAdapter
      net.sourceforge.seqware.common.util.runtools.TestConsoleAdapter

public class TestConsoleAdapter
extends ConsoleAdapter

Allows us to test the interactive console. To use, instantiate the object and call setLine(String) for each line that you want to read.

Author:
mtaschuk
